item.name: Control: Boot One Time - Boot Mode
Control: Boot One Time - Boot Source

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template Hw Atos BullSequanaEdge LLD:openbmc_reader[-f={$OPENBMC}-fan_tach.json,-i={#FAN_TACH},-p=Value].last()} > {Template Hw Atos BullSequanaEdge LLD:openbmc_reader[-f={$OPENBMC}-fan_tach.json,-i={#FAN_TACH},-p=WarningHigh].last()}
trigger_prototype.name: Sensor {#FAN_TACH} speed is pretty quick

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template Hw Atos BullSequanaEdge LLD:openbmc_reader[-f={$OPENBMC}-fan_tach.json,-i={#FAN_TACH},-p=Value].last()} < {Template Hw Atos BullSequanaEdge LLD:openbmc_reader[-f={$OPENBMC}-fan_tach.json,-i={#FAN_TACH},-p=WarningLow].last()}
trigger_prototype.name: Sensor {#FAN_TACH} speed is pretty slow

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template Hw Atos BullSequanaEdge LLD:openbmc_reader[-f={$OPENBMC}-fan_tach.json,-i={#FAN_TACH},-p=Value].last()} > {Template Hw Atos BullSequanaEdge LLD:openbmc_reader[-f={$OPENBMC}-fan_tach.json,-i={#FAN_TACH},-p=CriticalHigh].last()}
trigger_prototype.name: Sensor {#FAN_TACH} speed is quick

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template Hw Atos BullSequanaEdge LLD:openbmc_reader[-f={$OPENBMC}-fan_tach.json,-i={#FAN_TACH},-p=Value].last()} < {Template Hw Atos BullSequanaEdge LLD:openbmc_reader[-f={$OPENBMC}-fan_tach.json,-i={#FAN_TACH},-p=CriticalLow].last()}
trigger_prototype.name: Sensor {#FAN_TACH} speed is slow

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template Hw Atos BullSequanaEdge LLD:openbmc_reader[-f={$OPENBMC}-temperature.json,-i={#TEMPERATURE},-p=Value].last()} < {Template Hw Atos BullSequanaEdge LLD:openbmc_reader[-f={$OPENBMC}-temperature.json,-i={#TEMPERATURE},-p=CriticalLow].last()}
trigger_prototype.name: Temperature Sensor {#TEMPERATURE} is freezing

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template Hw Atos BullSequanaEdge LLD:openbmc_reader[-f={$OPENBMC}-temperature.json,-i={#TEMPERATURE},-p=Value].last()} > {Template Hw Atos BullSequanaEdge LLD:openbmc_reader[-f={$OPENBMC}-temperature.json,-i={#TEMPERATURE},-p=CriticalHigh].last()}
trigger_prototype.name: Temperature Sensor {#TEMPERATURE} is frying

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template Hw Atos BullSequanaEdge LLD:openbmc_reader[-f={$OPENBMC}-temperature.json,-i={#TEMPERATURE},-p=Value].last()} < {Template Hw Atos BullSequanaEdge LLD:openbmc_reader[-f={$OPENBMC}-temperature.json,-i={#TEMPERATURE},-p=WarningLow].last()}
trigger_prototype.name: Temperature Sensor {#TEMPERATURE} is pretty cold

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template Hw Atos BullSequanaEdge LLD:openbmc_reader[-f={$OPENBMC}-temperature.json,-i={#TEMPERATURE},-p=Value].last()} > {Template Hw Atos BullSequanaEdge LLD:openbmc_reader[-f={$OPENBMC}-temperature.json,-i={#TEMPERATURE},-p=WarningHigh].last()}
trigger_prototype.name: Temperature Sensor {#TEMPERATURE} is pretty hot

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template Hw Atos BullSequanaEdge LLD:openbmc_reader[-f={$OPENBMC}-voltage.json,-i={#VOLTAGE},-p=Value].last()} > {Template Hw Atos BullSequanaEdge LLD:openbmc_reader[-f={$OPENBMC}-voltage.json,-i={#VOLTAGE},-p=CriticalHigh].last()}
trigger_prototype.name: Voltage Sensor {#VOLTAGE} is above its critical high value

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template Hw Atos BullSequanaEdge LLD:openbmc_reader[-f={$OPENBMC}-voltage.json,-i={#VOLTAGE},-p=Value].last()} > {Template Hw Atos BullSequanaEdge LLD:openbmc_reader[-f={$OPENBMC}-voltage.json,-i={#VOLTAGE},-p=WarningHigh].last()}
trigger_prototype.name: Voltage Sensor {#VOLTAGE} is above its warning high value

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template Hw Atos BullSequanaEdge LLD:openbmc_reader[-f={$OPENBMC}-voltage.json,-i={#VOLTAGE},-p=Value].last()} < {Template Hw Atos BullSequanaEdge LLD:openbmc_reader[-f={$OPENBMC}-voltage.json,-i={#VOLTAGE},-p=CriticalLow].last()}
trigger_prototype.name: Voltage Sensor {#VOLTAGE} is below its critical low value

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template Hw Atos BullSequanaEdge LLD:openbmc_reader[-f={$OPENBMC}-voltage.json,-i={#VOLTAGE},-p=Value].last()} < {Template Hw Atos BullSequanaEdge LLD:openbmc_reader[-f={$OPENBMC}-voltage.json,-i={#VOLTAGE},-p=WarningLow].last()}
trigger_prototype.name: Voltage Sensor {#VOLTAGE} is below its warning low value
